site.tagline: A calm, editable landing page for personal work.
site.description: A neutral landing template for creators: clear sections, simple storytelling, and easy edits via config.
site.gradient: radial-gradient(circle at 15% 0%, rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.24), transparent 55%), radial-gradient(circle at 90% 10%, rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.18), transparent 45%)

seo.title: Creator Landing — Landing starter
seo.description: A calm landing page template for creator portfolios and personal projects.

fonts.sans: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji"
fonts.mono: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, "Liberation Mono", "Courier New", monospace

hero.headline: Share your work clearly.
hero.subheadline: A neutral, config-driven landing page you can personalize in minutes: sections, links, colors, and copy.

socialProof.title: Places your work can appear (placeholder)
socialProof.note: Replace these with publications, communities, or clients — or disable this section.

features.title: A simple structure for portfolios
features.description: Keep the page readable: one message per section, with links that go somewhere useful.

items.title: Config-first edits
items.description: Update brand and links in `src/config/site.ts`, and copy/lists in `src/config/content.ts`.

items.title: Toggle sections
items.description: Hide testimonials, logo walls, or extras while drafting — re-enable when ready.

items.title: Optional motion
items.description: Animations are subtle and respect reduced motion preferences.

howItWorks.title: Personalize in 10 minutes
howItWorks.description: Start from a preset, then adjust the details until it feels like you.

steps.title: Run init
steps.description: Use `npm run init` to set a name, colors, preset, and section toggles.

steps.title: Replace the copy
steps.description: Rewrite the hero, features, and FAQ in your voice — keep it concrete.

steps.title: Link to real work
steps.description: Update socials and footer links to point at your portfolio, repos, or contact.

testimonials.title: Notes from collaborators (optional)
testimonials.description: Enable this if you have real quotes. Otherwise keep it off.

items.quote: Short, specific, and real beats generic hype.
items.name: Name

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Use this section for expectations, links, and how to reach you.

items.question: Where do I edit the content?
items.answer: Update `src/config/content.ts`. Each section has an `enabled` flag and its own fields.

items.question: Can I remove sections completely?
items.answer: Yes. Disable via config first, then delete the component if you want.

items.question: Does it handle reduced motion?
items.answer: Yes. Motion respects user settings, and optional 3D can be disabled.

cta.title: Next steps
cta.description: Run the init script, update links, and replace assets before sharing.
